While some it fits beautifully, others find it runs a little large. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and comfortable
items.body: This dress is so comfortable and elegant- nice quality. I purchased this dress for a nice dinner with my husband. It fit beautifully, loved how it flowed without losing my shape. Halter top cut gave it the perfect shape. Loved it so much I am going to wear it to an upcoming wedding. Great option for multiple functions and good price! I'm 5'4", 138lbs and purchased a size small Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars gorgeous dress
items.body: Gorgeous dress. It is great quality and I love the material. The length was perfect. Super comfortable. The material was the perfect thickness and had some stretchiness to it. I bought this very last minute for a 50th birthday party, needed a formal dress. I didn't feel underdressed at all. I felt great in the dress and the fit was perfect Read more
items.author: Kassi Emmanuel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beach wedding ready!
items.body: Bought this dress for A destination wedding in Cancun Mexico it was lovely and so was the dress! ðŸ˜¬ absolutely a five out of five stars Iâ€™m 65 years old 5â€5â€™ and 130 pounds and the length was just perfect! and very flattering. I absolutely recommend it! Read more
items.author: R Amaya

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizing is strange. Made for very tall and large busted women.
items.body: Pros: nice material, pretty, stylish, feels expensive, flattering, comfortable. Cons: bust is way too large, disproportionate sizing, waaaaaay too long even with the highest heels ever. I am 5â€™4 and wore like 4 inch heels or higher and it still dragged on the floor. Not sure if I want to keep this or not. I am 128 pounds 5â€™4 normally a size 4-6. I got the 6. Maybe size down to avoid the problems listed. I donâ€™t think I would have been comfortable sizing down in this though as the waist was perfect fit. Read more
items.author: Em

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flattering Formal
items.body: Bought this to wear to a family event that had a Lavender/Purple color theme. I had tried it on and it fit perfectly in XL (I'm 5'6 185lbs). Its was flowy with a nice outer material and just the right length with heels or flats (shorter individuals may find it too long. The underlay was a different material with stretch and gave you a shape so the dress wouldn't look like a trash bag or curtain, but if you get a lighter color it may show some lumps and bumps, nothing shape wear couldn't smooth right out. The dress is flattering and the halter style top made it really cute. Con: Unfortunately, I didn't get to wear the dress because I didn't pack the right bra to wear...just assumed a strapless bra would work. All strapless bras are not created equal. Mine showed under the arm very prominently and the underlay did not cover the bulge at the top of my bra or the outline of the bra...all this was very noticeable through the outer fabric material. So, I went with my back up. I only returned it bc it was color specific and not something I would wear continuously. I may consider black and have it as a go-to for formal occasions. (Not a casual dress IMO). Read more
items.author: DavisInDallas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You will love the fit
items.body: Perfect fit. Color was exact. I received many compliments on this dress. It was a dream to wear. Very comfortable. Read more
items.author: D. Blaney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great overall!
items.body: This was so comfortable... True to size. So many complements! Material is not see thru-double layers was key! Washed on gentle cycle and still looks brand new. Read more
items.author: Kimberly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Big Boobs Beware
items.body: looks pretty good, though you can tell it's not the best quality. The neck is kind of tight and if you have big boobs it pulls a bit. Fabric okay. All together a good dress for what I needed, but not something I would say is 100% great. Read more
items.author: L. Covington

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Rust Brown, Army Green, Sage Green, Black and White, Black, Orange, Dark Green, Red, Polka White, White, Purple, Yellow, Mauve Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
